title: Bad connection with server ( constant lag spikes - request timed out)
body:
Hi Support,

For more than a week i am experiencing constant lag spikes on NA server and i run always ping on server ip address and it used to be stable without any bad request or request timed out, but now it is showing as the following:

https://imgur.com/3KdwmYd

I am running at the same time ping on Google.com and it showing stable connections without any bad request.

So can you help me on that ? Trying to rank but losing much cuz of that

Thanks in advance 
Regards

replies.body:
Good morning!  These results are pretty nuts, your ping is exceedingly high as your router attempts to leave your network and travel outside.  Basically we want to turn that 4022  on your second hop to like a 10.  This might be caused by a poor local setting or degrading router.

I highly recommend running through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot your local and router settings, and help strengthen your network.  Once complete, test it in a custom game and feel free to run another traceroute to see if things improve.

Thanks for your quick response , Porocles.

I don't really know but right now the lag spikes are gone and i am no more experiencing it for the first time after about 1 week and a half.

Thanks anyway , will try to contact again if the problem happens again.

Regards

Thanks for the route, but we could get a more precise analysis of your routing with [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/).  Download that and trace it again to 104.160.131.1 for about 5 minutes.  Feel free to remove the IP on the first to hops for privacy, and let me know what you find.
